attributes.comment:
In a time when we should be addressing ways to handle the illegal immagrants
and those trying to get here in a more successful manner, this increased schedule
will be a detriment to those who are here and trying to abide by our laws.

Those applying for green cards and naturalization ususlly do not have high paying
jobs. They have to scrape up the money to meet the current fees. I do not have
statistics but I have plenty of anecdotal evidence as I do data entry in an attorney's
office and type the information they provide on forms. I do not have a conflict of
interest because the attorney is my relative and I don't get paid.

In short, these increased fees will be a slap in the face to those who are trying to
abide by the laws and do things accroding to procedures.

Please consider what you are doing to hard working people trying to abide by the
law.

Thank you,

Christine Eheman
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Christine Eheman
